entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: 恩，看到这篇文章说明已经成功搭建了一个hexo！Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post12345678$ehexo new "My New Post"``` More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)### Run server``` bash$ hexo server More info: Server### Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
